key_breakthroughs.insight: AUTONOMOUS CUSTOMER SERVICE - Full AGI-level customer retention system. ZION reads unread WhatsApp messages, analyzes intent (payment? question? complaint?), auto-replies when confident (80%+ threshold), flags complex issues for manual review. Auto-reply patterns: payment confirmations (90%), pricing questions (95%), renewal requests (90%), status checks (85%). Manual review: complaints, negotiations, VIP customers, <80% confidence.
